Number System.subject: Number System
Number System.question: Statements: I. If n is prime >5, then $n^4 - 1$ divisible by 2400. II. Every square is of the form $5n$, $5n-1$, or $5n+1$. Which are correct?
Number System.explanation: Fermat-type result; statement II is false.
